name: Athena
description:
An AI-powered comprehensive AP course learning and SAT prep platform designed specifically for homeschoolers, offering personalized learning experiences at approximately $1k per student.

Leverages the CoachBot Platform for core functionality including curriculum, user progress tracking, authentication, and AI-generated content. Features AI-generated video lessons, interactive quizzes, free response questions (FRQ) for skills assessment, and AI tutor support.

Built on AWS serverless architecture using AppSync (GraphQL), Lambda, Cognito, and RDS PostgreSQL with persistent caching. Targets homeschoolers in ESA states with mastery-based progression and adaptive learning powered by CoachBot's algorithms.

images.description: Course dashboard for 3rd Grade Math showing Unit 1 (Multiplication) with expandable lessons like 'Understanding Multiplication With Groups' (+15 XP), Next Up panel, and Start Lesson button.
Learning interface displaying the multiplication lesson with clear objectives and visual explanations using colored dots in groups (3 × 5 = 15) with progress tracking at 17%.
Practice quiz showing visual multiplication problem with circles containing blue dots, asking students to complete the equation '__ × 4 = 20' with Submit button and help options.
